title: Cavium to buy network equipment maker QLogic for $1.36 billion

content: June 15 Chipmaker Cavium Inc said it would buy network equipment maker QLogic Corp for about $1.36 billion  as it looks to expand in the data center and storage market.
name: Cavium Inc
title: UPDATE 2-Cavium to buy network equipment maker QLogic for $1.36 bln

content: June 15 Chipmaker Cavium Inc said it would buy network infrastructure products maker QLogic Corp  for about $1.36 billion in equity value  as it looks to expand in the data center and storage market.
name: Cavium Inc
title: Cavium to buy network infrastructure products maker QLogic for $1.36 bln
